description: This table contains the 4-4-5 calendar with all dates until 2031 and associated fiscal year and quarter information

schema.name: eom
schema.description: End of Month (eom): The last date of the month

schema.name: fiscal_year
schema.description: A code representing the fiscal year in which the 'date' resides (e.g., 'FY17')

schema.name: quarter
schema.description: A code representing the fiscal quarter in which the 'date' resides (e.g., 'Q4')

schema.name: eoq
schema.description: End of Quarter (eoq): The last date in the fiscal quarter in which the 'date' resides

schema.name: holiday
schema.description: A boolean flag (i.e., 'true' or 'false) indicating whether a US holiday occurs on the 'date'
